entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is described as standing with his hands behind his back, staring into the fire.

entities.name: fleur delacour
entities.description: Fleur Delacour is described as throwing back her sheet of long, silvery hair when Harry walked in.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as looking at the three champions and being led forward by Ludo Bagman.

entities.name: ludo bagman
entities.description: Ludo Bagman is described as entering the room and taking Harry by the arm.

entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: Viktor Krum is described as straightening up and having a surly face.

relationships.description: Ludo Bagman introduced Viktor Krum as the fourth Triwizard champion.
